title: USD Alumnus Mike Brown ('93) Named New York Knicks Head Coach - University of San Diego Athletics
snippet: Men's Basketball July 10, 2025 · NEW YORK – University of San Diego alumnus Mike Brown (’93) was named the head coach of one of the NBA’s most storied franchises, the New York Knicks on Monday, July 7. Brown played for the Toreros Men’s ...

title: Knicks hire Mike Brown: How New York looks different in 2025-26 - ESPN
snippet: Shams Charania joins "The Pat McAfee Show" and breaks the news that Mike Brown is expected to be the New York Knicks' next head coach.

title: New York Knicks hire Mike Brown as new head coach | CNN
snippet: The New York Knicks have confirmed the hiring of Mike Brown as the team’s new head coach.

title: List of New York Knicks head coaches - Wikipedia
snippet: Tom Thibodeau was the Knicks head coach from 2020 to 2025. ^ A running total of the number of coaches of the Knicks. Thus, any coach who has two or more separate terms as head coach is only counted once. ^ Each year is linked to an article about that particular NBA season.
